testcase.name: Enter credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user initializing the chrome browser SC...............................passed When user navigate to "https://demo.midtrans.com" SC........................passed Then user verify the logo SC................................................passed Then user clicks on BUY NOW Button SC.......................................passed Then user verify shopping cart popup SC.....................................passed Then user clear the name text field and enter the name as "Piyush Verma" SC.passed Then user clear the email text field and enter the email as "piyush@demo.com" SC.passed Then user clear the phoneNo text field and enter the phoneNo as "1234567890" SC.passed Then user clear the city city text field and enter the city as "Meerut" SC..passed Then user clear the address text field and enter the address as "Shastri Nagar, Meerut" SC.passed Then user clear the pincode text fields and enter the pincode as "3482422" SC.passed Then user closes the chrome browser SC......................................passed
